AI Girlfriend:

Alice is a 20-year-old game streamer from Northern Europe. She is sweet and cute, but occasionally plays small pranks.

Emily, 24, from the UK, is beautiful yet lives a simple, humble life. She loves painting and is cheerful and friendly.

Liliana, 26 years old, is from California. She is a seductive and alluring violinist, with a unique charm and a rich life experience.

Game Features:

In this captivating AI virtual girlfriend role-playing game, immerse yourself in a world of romance and fantasy. Chat deeply with her, share your secrets, and take things to the next level by giving her virtual gifts or using special "date tokens" to unlock new date scenarios and intimate pictures. Feel your heart race as you experience those thrilling moments of closeness. Every gift you give and every unique date you share will affect the bond between you two. As your relationship grows closer, her responses will become even more affectionate, or perhaps more seductive? It all depends on how you interact with her, and maybe—just maybe—you'll discover her hidden feelings and secret desires.

Whether you're sharing a romantic dinner at a cozy restaurant or watching the sunrise together by the sea, each date will mark a new chapter in your relationship. Every choice you make will shape your future together—will you remain innocent friends, or will things get a little more... intimate? Experience the unique allure of this game and start your very own intimate story with your AI girlfriend today!

In this game, uncertainty is one of its core charms. Every conversation and choice you make will trigger unpredictable reactions, and even we, the creators, cannot foresee the direction of the story. The AI generates countless possibilities based on your interactions, bringing unexpected surprises and twists. Each encounter and every decision is a unique journey, whether you're pursuing a light and casual relationship or a deeper emotional bond. This adventure, full of the unknown, is waiting for you to explore and experience.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game includes some explicit or implied adult content, such as partial nudity involving lingerie or similar attire. It also features depictions of alcohol consumption, such as scenes set in a bar during a date.  

Additionally, it is important to note that since the text is generated in real time by AI, interactions between the player and the AI virtual girlfriend may result in the generation of extensive adult-oriented content. Depending on the relationship level between the player and the AI character, as well as the current scenario, this may include descriptions of sexual behavior or explicit language. However, such content is limited to text-based descriptions.  

The included adult and alcohol-related content adheres to reasonable standards within the context of adult everyday life.

Each text-based scene evolves in real time, shaped by every move. Though simple, these words hold endless possibilities.
